name: Knockback (Deliriny2020)
description:
Hey everyone! this is a game where you shoot a gun to move yourself around. There is power-ups and stuff and yeah. 

When you get the portal power up to use the portals, press 1 and it will place a portal where your cursor is, and then press 2 for the other portal.

Have a great day!

:D

-Deliriny2020
